about_the_game:
You leave the city to help out with the grand opening of the new family business. The Silver Oasis is not just a resort; it's a true haven from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Enjoy the fresh air, mend your cracking joints, and drink a couple of refreshing cocktails. However, before any guests arrive, there are rooms to prepare for check-in, horses to groom in the stables, and local caves to explore and ensure their safety before conducting trips within their magnificent gloom! Who knew managing a vacation spot would be this intense?

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔎 Embark on a Serene Adventure: Escape the cacophony of city life and dive into the tranquility of Silver Oasis, a family-run resort designed as your personal haven. Say goodbye to the daily grind and immerse yourself in an environment where relaxation meets adventure!

🔎 Engage in Varied Activities: Prepare rooms for the arrival of guests, groom horses in the stables, and ensure the safety of local caves for exploration. Managing a vacation spot is more thrilling and engaging than you ever imagined!

🔎 Solve Intriguing Puzzles: With an abundance of captivating puzzles scattered throughout the resort, your hidden object skills will be put to the test. Enjoy the challenge as you contribute to the grand opening of this unique retreat!

🔎 Explore and Restore: Traverse every corner of the most enchanting resort, each place brimming with its own unique atmosphere. From fresh air to the soothing sounds of nature, help get everything ready for an unforgettable guest vacation while taking time to care for yourself!

🔎 Unlock Bonus Content: Complete the main storyline to access a special bonus chapter. Help your cousin navigate through an emergency at the hotel, adding another layer of excitement and challenge to your journey!
